# `install_giotto_environment_specific`

install_giotto_environment_specific


## Description

installation of giotto environment


## Usage

```r
install_giotto_environment_specific(
  packages_to_install = c("pandas", "networkx", "python-igraph", "leidenalg",
    "python-louvain", "python.app", "scikit-learn"),
  python_version = "3.6",
  verbose = TRUE
)
```
